projects.title: Selected Work
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects I've worked on

webapigroup.description: Collaborated with WebApiGroup on their platform - API monitoring dashboard with real-time analytics and performance tracking

rico.description: Mobile application for finding and selling goods with intuitive user interface

singsong.description: Mobile app available on Playstore to find camp songs with admin panel for content management

addictionRecovery.description: Mobile and web platform connecting doctors specialized in addictions (drugs, alcohol, tobacco) with patients

freelance2024.description: Development of new features for mobile and web applications with React Native and Next.js. Created Rico (marketplace app), WeGroupAPI (monitoring dashboard), EasyVecto (logo transformation app), and We Paint Well (painting services platform).

praktek.description: Development of web and mobile applications using React ecosystem. Focused on writing unit tests and ensuring code quality across projects.

futurmap.description: Integrated project management functionalities in the company's ERP system using Django and Angular. Gained experience in enterprise software development.
